name: Sweet-and-Spicy Ketchup
ingredients: 1 Tbsp olive oil,1 small onion,2 cloves garlic,0.25 cup brown sugar,0.5 tsp smoked paprika,0.25 tsp allspice,0.25 tsp ground cloves,0.333 cup distilled white vinegar,1 Tbsp tomato paste,2 8-oz cans tomato sauce,some  salt,some  pepper
method: In a saucepan, heat the oil. Add the onion and garlic and cook over moderately low heat, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 7 minutes. Add the brown sugar, paprika, allspice and cloves and cook, stirring occasionally, until the sugar melts. Add the vinegar and tomato paste and cook over moderate heat until thick, about 3 minutes. Stir in the tomato sauce and simmer over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until very thick, 15 to 20 minutes. Transfer the ketchup to a blender or food processor and puree until smooth. Season with salt and pepper
cooklang:
In a #saucepan{}, heat the @olive oil{1%Tbsp}. Add the @onion{1%small} and @garlic{2%cloves} and cook over moderately low heat, stirring occasionally, until softened, about ~{7%minutes}. Add the @distilled white vinegar{1/3%cup} and @tomato paste{1%Tbsp} and cook over moderate heat until thick, about ~{3%minutes}. Stir in the @tomato sauce{2%8-oz cans} and simmer over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until very thick, 15 to ~{20%minutes}.

Transfer the ketchup to a blender or #food processor{} and puree until smooth. Season with @salt{} and @pepper{}.

name: Classic Tartar Sauce
ingredients: 1 small shallot,1 clove garlic,1 cup mayonnaise,2 Tbsp caper berries,2 Tbsp pickles,1 Tbsp chives,1 Tbsp parsley,1 Tbsp lemon juice,1 tsp Dijon mustard,1 tsp whole grain mustard,some  salt,some  pepper
method: Whisk shallot, garlic, mayonnaise, caper berries, pickles, chives, parsley, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, and whole grain mustard in a small bowl until combined. name: Creamy Vegan Cheese Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup potatoes,0.25 cup carrots,0.25 cup onion,0.5 cup raw cashews or white beans,4 Tbsp nutritional yeast,1 Tbsp lemon juice,1 tsp salt,0.5 tsp garlic powder,1 pinch smoked paprika,1 pinch cayenne pepper
method: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F and bake whole small potatoes until tender, approximately 30 minutes, depending on size of little potatoes. Remove potatoes from oven and allow to cool. Slice potatoes in half, scoop out pulp leaving ¼-inch in shell. Place pulp in a medium bowl. Add dairy-free milk, low-fat mayo, salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, and smoked paprika to potato in bowl and mash together using a potato masher or fork. Fill potato skins with mashed potato mixture. Drizzle with Creamy Vegan Cheese sauce, then top with more smoked paprika, chives, and cilantro. Drain tofu and squeeze excess water out on paper towels. Blend all ingredients in blender. Leftover mayo can be used on sandwiches, wraps, and in other sauces. Store in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks. In medium pot, bring about 3 cups of water to a boil. Place potatoes, carrots, and onion in pot and allow to cook until veggies are tender, approximately 15 minutes. Cooking time will vary based on how small the veggies are diced. When veggies are tender, drain and place them in blender. NOTE: reserve 1 cup of the broth, and add to blender. Add all the remaining ingredients, and blend until smooth. Now, it’s ready to use as a Loaded Potato Skins topping, nacho cheese dip, mac-n-cheese, topping for steamed broccoli, or anything else you need a creamy, cheesy sauce in. It makes approximately 1 quart and can be stored in the refrigerator up to 2 weeks
cooklang:
In #medium pot{}, bring about 3 cups of water to a boil. Place peeled and diced @potatoes{1%cup}, diced @carrots{1/4%cup}, and diced @onion{1/4%cup} in pot and allow to cook until veggies are tender, approximately ~{15%minutes}. Cooking time will vary based on how small the veggies are diced.

When veggies are tender, drain and place them in blender.

Reserve 1 cup of the broth from the veggies, and add to blender. Add the @raw cashews or white beans{1/2%cup}, @nutritional yeast{4%Tbsp}, @lemon juice{1%Tbsp}, @salt{1%tsp}, @garlic powder{1/2%tsp}, @smoked paprika{1%pinch}, @cayenne pepper{1%pinch}, and blend until smooth.

Now, it’s ready to use as a Loaded Potato Skins topping, nacho cheese dip, mac-n-cheese, topping for steamed broccoli, or anything else you need a creamy, cheesy sauce in. It makes approximately 1 quart and can be stored in the refrigerator up to 2 weeks.

Steps:

- Drain and place cooked veggies in blender with reserved broth.
- Blend all ingredients until smooth.

method: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl. Whisk to combine. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. This dip will keep nicely in the refrigerator for up to a week. Enjoy!

name: Garlic Aioli
ingredients: 2 large eggs,1 large clove garlic,1  lemon,0.25 tsp salt,0.5 cup grapeseed oil,0.25 cup olive oil
method: Place the eggs in a bowl and cover with warm water to bring to room temperature. Paste the garlic using a microplane or very fine grater. You can also use a garlic press, or finely mince the garlic then smash it with the side of your knife until it turns to a paste. Juice ½ of the lemon. Measure 1 teaspoon of fresh juice and set aside. Separate the yolk from one egg and discard the white. Add the egg yolk, the white and yolk of another egg, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, the garlic paste, and salt to a food processor or blender. Pulse the food processor until the ingredients are evenly blended and frothy. Add the grapeseed oil and olive oil to a measuring cup. Turn the food processor on and add the oil very slowly (drop by drop, not a stream). Once the mixture starts to thicken and you can see it emulsifying (it's a consistent mixture and you can't see the oil), then start pouring faster, in a thin stream. Once all the oil is added, stop the food processor. Check the mixture — the consistency should be similar to mayonnaise. Taste and add more salt or lemon juice, if desired. Let the aioli sit for at least 1 hour before serving to allow the flavors to meld. Transfer the aioli to a serving dish and top with fresh cracked black pepper
cooklang:
Place the @eggs{2%large} in a #bowl{} and cover with warm water to bring to room temperature.

Paste the @garlic{1%large clove} using a #microplane or very fine grater{}. You can also use a garlic press, or finely mince the garlic then smash it with the side of your knife until it turns to a paste.

Juice 1/2 of the @lemon{1}. Measure 1 teaspoon of fresh juice and set aside.

Separate the yolk from one egg and discard the white.

Add the egg yolk, the white and yolk of another egg, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, the garlic paste, and @salt{1/4%tsp} to a #food processor or blender{}.

Pulse the food processor until the ingredients are evenly blended and frothy.

Add the @grapeseed oil{1/2%cup} and @olive oil{1/4%cup} to a #measuring cup{}. Turn the food processor on and add the oil very slowly (drop by drop, not a stream).

Once the mixture starts to thicken and you can see it emulsifying (it's a consistent mixture and you can't see the oil), then start pouring faster, in a thin stream.

Once all the oil is added, stop the food processor. Check the mixture — the consistency should be similar to mayonnaise. Taste and add more salt or lemon juice, if desired.

Let the aioli sit for at least 1 hour before serving to allow the flavors to meld.

Transfer the aioli to a serving dish and top with fresh cracked black pepper.
predict_cooklang:
INGREDIENTS:
  - eggs: 2
  - garlic: 1 clove
  - lemon: 1
  - salt: 0.25 tsp
  - grapeseed oil: 0.5 cup
  - olive oil: 0.25 cup

RECIPE:
STEP 1: Soak the eggs in warm water to bring them to room temperature.
STEP 2: Prepare the garlic paste using a microplane, garlic press, or fine mincing and smashing with a knife.
STEP 3: Juice half of the lemon and measure 1 teaspoon of fresh juice.
STEP 4: Separate one egg yolk from its white and discard the white. Add this yolk along with another egg's yolk, white, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, garlic paste, and salt to a food processor or blender.
STEP 5: Pulse the ingredients until they are evenly blended and frothy.
STEP 6: Slowly add grapeseed oil and olive oil in a measuring cup to the food processor while it is running. Start with drops and gradually increase to a thin stream once emulsification begins.
STEP 7: Stop adding oil when all of it has been incorporated, and check the mixture for consistency similar to mayonnaise.
STEP 8: Taste and adjust seasoning as needed by adding more salt or lemon juice.
STEP 9: Allow the aioli to sit for at least 1 hour before serving to allow flavors to meld.
STEP 10: Transfer the aioli to a serving dish, top with fresh cracked black pepper, and serve.

name: Crème Anglaise
ingredients: 200 ml whole milk,100 ml heavy cream,0.25 tsp vanilla paste,3 large egg yolks,40 g granulated sugar
method: For the crème anglaise, pour the milk and cream into a small pan over a low heat. Add the vanilla paste and bring slowly to a simmer. In a medium bowl, whisk the egg yolks and caster sugar together until pale. Pour the mixture over the warm milk, whisking continuously, then pour into a clean, heavy-based pan and cook over a very low heat. Simmer the mixture gently for 3–4 minutes, stirring continuously, until smooth and thick enough to coat the back of a spoon. Remove from the heat, cover the surface with clingfilm to prevent a skin forming, then leave to cool. For the meringue. Heat the oven to 150°C/130°C fan/300°F/Gas 2. In a stand mixer, whisk the egg whites, salt, cream of tartar and 25g of the caster sugar on medium speed for 5 minutes. Increase the speed to high and add the remaining 50g sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time, whisking continuously to a soft glossy meringue. Whisk in the vanilla paste. Spoon the meringue into the piping bag and snip the bag 2cm from the pointed end. Pipe the meringue into the moulds and level with a palette knife. Place the mould on a rack set in a roasting tin. Carefully pour boiling water into the roasting tin to come just over the level of the rack. Do not let the water touch the silicon mould. Transfer to the oven and bake for 9–10 minutes, until set. Remove the mould from the oven and immediately turn out the meringues onto the silicone sheet. Leave to cool. For the caramel cage, turn the silicone mould upside down on a large sheet of greaseproof paper, so the domes are facing upwards. Lightly grease the domes with oil. Melt the sugar and glucose in a pan over a high heat and cook to a dark, golden caramel. Remove from the heat and plunge the base of the pan into a bowl of iced water to cool the caramel slightly. Using the back of a fork, flick the caramel backwards and forwards over the silicone domes to form 6 cages. Leave to cool, then turn upside down and peel the silicon mould away from the caramel cages. Pour the crème anglaise into the cocktail glasses and float a meringue in each glass. Place a caramel cage in each glass over the meringue. Serve immediately
cooklang:
Pour the @whole milk{200%ml} and @heavy cream{100%ml} into a #small pan{} over a low heat. Add the @vanilla paste{1/4%tsp} and bring slowly to a simmer.

In a #medium bowl{}, whisk the @egg yolks{3%large} and @granulated sugar{40%g} together until pale. Pour the mixture over the warm milk, whisking continuously, then pour into a clean, #heavy-based pan{} and cook over a very low heat.

Simmer the mixture gently for 3 to ~{4%minutes}, stirring continuously, until smooth and thick enough to coat the back of a #spoon{}. Remove from the heat, cover the surface with #clingfilm{} to prevent a skin forming, then leave to cool.
predict_cooklang:
**Crème Anglaise**

*   **Ingredients:**
    *   200 ml whole milk
    *   100 ml heavy cream
    *   0.25 tsp vanilla paste
    *   3 large egg yolks
    *   40 g granulated sugar

*   **Instructions:**

    1.  **Pour the milk and cream into a small pan over a low heat.**
        *   Add the vanilla paste and bring slowly to a simmer.
    2.  **In a medium bowl, whisk the egg yolks and caster sugar together until pale.**
        *   Pour the mixture over the warm milk, whisking continuously, then pour into a clean, heavy-based pan and cook over a very low heat.
    3.  **Simmer the mixture gently for 3–4 minutes, stirring continuously, until smooth and thick enough to coat the back of a spoon.**
        *   Remove from the heat, cover the surface with clingfilm to prevent a skin forming, then leave to cool.

**Meringue**

*   **Ingredients:**
    *   3 large egg whites
    *   Salt
    *   Cream of tartar
    *   75 g caster sugar

*   **Instructions:**

    1.  **Heat the oven to 150°C/130°C fan/300°F/Gas 2.**
        *   In a stand mixer, whisk the egg whites, salt, cream of tartar, and 25g of the caster sugar on medium speed for 5 minutes.
    2.  **Increase the speed to high and add the remaining 50g sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time, whisking continuously to a soft glossy meringue.**
        *   Whisk in the vanilla paste.
    3.  **Spoon the meringue into the piping bag and snip the bag 2cm from the pointed end.**
        *   Pipe the meringue into the moulds and level with a palette knife.

**Caramel Cage**

*   **Ingredients:**
    *   Sugar
    *   Glucose

*   **Instructions:**

    1.  **Turn the silicone mould upside down on a large sheet of greaseproof paper, so the domes are facing upwards.**
        *   Lightly grease the domes with oil.
    2.  **Melt the sugar and glucose in a pan over a high heat and cook to a dark, golden caramel.**
        *   Remove from the heat and plunge the base of the pan into a bowl of iced water to cool the caramel slightly.
    3.  **Using the back of a fork, flick the caramel backwards and forwards over the silicone domes to form 6 cages.**
        *   Leave to cool, then turn upside down and peel the silicon mould away from the caramel cages.

**Assembly**

*   **Ingredients:**
    *   Crème anglaise
    *   Meringue
    *   Caramel cage

*   **Instructions:**

    1.  **Pour the crème anglaise into the cocktail glasses and float a meringue in each glass.**
        *   Place a caramel cage in each glass over the meringue.
    2.  **Serve immediately.**

name: Alfredo Sauce
ingredients: 0.5 cup butter,1.5 cups heavy whipping cream,2 tsp garlic,0.5 tsp Italian seasoning,0.5 tsp salt,0.25 tsp pepper,2 cups Parmesan
method: Add the butter and cream to a large skillet. Simmer over low heat for 2 minutes. Whisk in the garlic, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper for one minute. Whisk in the parmesan cheese until melted. Serve immediately

Whisk in the @Parmesan{2%cups} cheese until melted.

Serve immediately.

name: Tomato Ragu
ingredients: 2 Tbsp olive oil,1.5 cup onion,0.5 cup celery,0.5 cup carrots,1.5 lbs vegetarian sausage,0.5 lb mushrooms,1 Tbsp fresh thyme,2 Tbsp garlic,2 28-oz cans tomatoes,1.5 cups tomato puree,some  salt,some  pepper,0.25 cup parsley
method: In a Dutch oven, heat a little extra virgin olive and sauté the onion until lightly caramelized.Add the celery and cook for a few minutes. In a frying pan, add a couple spoons of olive oil and when hot add the sausage and brown until caramelized.Constantly breaking the sausage up while it cooks so you have small uniform crumbles.When deep golden brown, remove the meat from the pan and drain any extra fat. Back in the Dutch oven, add the mushrooms and sweat them for 5 minutes or however long it takes to eliminate the water.Add the thyme and garlic when fragrant, add fresh thyme, chopped tomatoes and tomato puree.Add the cooked meat, adjust with salt and pepper and letsimmerslowly for 45 minutes
cooklang:
In a #Dutch oven{}, heat a little extra virgin @olive oil{2%Tbsp} and sauté the @onion{1.5%cup} until lightly caramelized, about ~{4%minutes}. Add the @celery{1/2%cup} and @carrots{1/2%cup} and cook for 1 to ~{2%minutes}.

In a #frying pan{}, add a couple spoons of olive oil and when hot add the @vegetarian sausage{1.5%lbs} and brown until caramelized. Constantly breaking the sausage up while it cooks so you have small uniform crumbles. When deep golden brown, remove the meat from the pan and drain any extra fat.

Back in the Dutch oven, add the @mushrooms{1/2%lb} and sweat them for ~{5%minutes} or however long it takes to eliminate the water. Add the @fresh thyme{1%Tbsp} and @garlic{2%Tbsp} when fragrant, chopped @tomatoes{2%28-oz cans} and @tomato puree{1.5%cups}. Add the cooked vegetarian meat, adjust with @salt{} and @pepper{} and let simmer slowly for ~{45%minutes}.

Add the @parsley{1/4%cup} at the end.

method: Place all ingredients into a bowl and whisk well until smooth. Taste and adjust the flavors as needed

name: Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: 1 Tbsp unsalted butter,2 Tbsp shallots,2 cups mushrooms,some  salt,2 Tbsp tarragon,2 Tbsp garlic,2 Tbsp Balsamic vinegar,1 cup red wine,1.5 cups vegetable stock,some  salt,some  pepper,3 Tbsp heavy cream,1 Tbsp parsley,2 Tbsp cornstarch (optional)
method: In a sauce pan, heat 1 tablespoon sweet butter, when hot, add shallots and cook until light golden brown and add the mushrooms and the salt and cook until they have released most of their water (this could take 7 to 10 minutes). Add the fresh or dried herbs, garlic and when fragrant (about 15 to 20 seconds) add the vinegar and wine and let it reduce until about half of it remain.Add stock and cook for 15/20 minutes.Add cream and parsley if you like. Adjust the thickness of the sauce with sweet butter or cornstarch and at the last minutes add as much butter as you like.Chef adds at least 2 large tablespoons!!!
cooklang:
In a #sauce pan{}, heat 1 tablespoon @unsalted butter{1%Tbsp}, when hot, add @shallots{2%Tbsp} and cook until light golden brown and add the @mushrooms{2%cups} and the @salt{} and cook until they have released most of their water (this could take 7 to ~{10%minutes}).

Add the @tarragon{2%Tbsp}, @garlic{2%Tbsp} and when fragrant (about 15 to 20 seconds) add the @Balsamic vinegar{2%Tbsp} and @red wine{1%cup} and let it reduce until about half of it remain. Add @vegetable stock{1.5%cups}, add @salt{} and @pepper{} to taste and cook for 15 to ~{20%minutes}. Add @heavy cream{3%Tbsp} and @parsley{1%Tbsp} if you like.

Adjust the thickness of the sauce with unsalted butter or @cornstarch (optional){2%Tbsp} when boiling a little bit at a time and at the last minutes add as much butter as you like. Chef adds at least 2 large tablespoons!!!
predict_cooklang:
INGREDIENTS:
- 1 Tbsp unsalted butter
- 2 Tbsp shallots
- 2 cups mushrooms
- some salt
- 2 Tbsp tarragon
- 2 Tbsp garlic
- 2 Tbsp Balsamic vinegar
- 1 cup red wine
- 1.5 cups vegetable stock
- some pepper
- 3 Tbsp heavy cream
- 1 Tbsp parsley
- 2 Tbsp cornstarch (optional)

RECIPE:
HEAT 1 Tbsp unsalted butter IN A SAUCE PAN.
ADD 2 Tbsp shallots TO THE SAUCE PAN AND COOK UNTIL LIGHT GOLDEN BROWN.
ADD 2 cups mushrooms, some salt TO THE SAUCE PAN AND COOK UNTIL THEY HAVE RELEASED MOST OF THEIR WATER (THIS COULD TAKE 7 TO 10 MINUTES).
ADD 2 Tbsp tarragon, 2 Tbsp garlic TO THE SAUCE PAN AND COOK UNTIL FRAGRANT (ABOUT 15 TO 20 SECONDS).
ADD 2 Tbsp Balsamic vinegar, 1 cup red wine TO THE SAUCE PAN AND LET IT REDUCE UNTIL ABOUT HALF OF IT REMAINS.
ADD 1.5 cups vegetable stock TO THE SAUCE PAN AND COOK FOR 15/20 MINUTES.
ADD 3 Tbsp heavy cream, 1 Tbsp parsley IF YOU LIKE.
ADJUST THE THICKNESS OF THE SAUCE WITH 1 Tbsp unsalted butter OR 2 Tbsp cornstarch (optional) AND ADD AS MUCH BUTTER AS YOU LIKE AT THE LAST MINUTES.

name: Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: 2 large shallots,1 lb cremini mushroom,some  water,3 cloves garlic,1 tsp thyme,1 tsp sage,1 tsp rosemary,0.5 cup dry white wine,3 cups cauliflower florets,2 cups vegetable broth,0.5 tsp salt,some  pepper,2 Tbsp nutritional yeast
method: Sauté the shallots and mushroom over medium heat for 5 to 6 minutes. Add water 1 to 2 tablespoons at a time, as needed, to keep them from sticking to the pan. Add the garlic, thyme, sage, and rosemary, and cook for another minute. Add the white wine and cook until the wine is reduced by half, about 3 minutes (see tip). Add the cauliflower purée, vegetable broth, sea salt, black pepper, and nutritional yeast. Whisk well and cook over medium heat for 10 minutes until the gravy thickens some
cooklang:
Sauté the @shallots{2%large} and @cremini mushroom{1%lb} over medium heat for 5 to ~{6%minutes}. Add @water{} 1 to 2 tablespoons at a time, as needed, to keep them from sticking to the #pan{}.

Add the @garlic{3%cloves}, @thyme{1%tsp}, @sage{1%tsp}, and @rosemary{1%tsp}, and cook for ~{1%minute} more.

Add the @dry white wine{1/2%cup} and cook until the wine is reduced by half, about ~{3%minutes}.

Tip: If using lemon juice instead of white wine, you do not need to reduce the sauce.

Make a purée from steamed @cauliflower florets{3%cups}.

Add the cauliflower purée, @vegetable broth{2%cups}, sea @salt{1/2%tsp}, black @pepper{}, and @nutritional yeast{2%Tbsp}.

Whisk well and cook over medium heat for ~{10%minutes} until the gravy thickens some.
predict_cooklang:
INGREDIENTS:
- 2 large shallots
- 1 lb cremini mushroom
- some water
- 3 cloves garlic
- 1 tsp thyme
- 1 tsp sage
- 1 tsp rosemary
- 0.5 cup dry white wine
- 3 cups cauliflower florets
- 2 cups vegetable broth
- 0.5 tsp salt
- some pepper
- 2 Tbsp nutritional yeast

RECIPE:
SAUTE the shallots and mushroom over medium heat for 5 to 6 minutes.
ADD water 1 to 2 tablespoons at a time, as needed, to keep them from sticking to the pan.
ADD the garlic, thyme, sage, and rosemary, and cook for another minute.
REDUCE the white wine until it is reduced by half, about 3 minutes (see tip).
ADD the cauliflower puree, vegetable broth, sea salt, black pepper, and nutritional yeast. WHISK well.
COOK over medium heat for 10 minutes until the gravy thickens some.

name: Buffalo Sauce
ingredients: 0.67 cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot),0.5 cup butter,1.5 Tbsp white vinegar,0.25 tsp Worcestershire sauce,0.25 tsp cayenne pepper,0.125 tsp garlic powder,some  salt
method: Gather all ingredients. Combine hot sauce, butter, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, cayenne, garlic powder, and salt in a pot over medium heat. Bring to a simmer while stirring with a whisk. As soon as the liquid begins to bubble on the sides of the pot, remove from heat, stir with the whisk, and set aside for use. Enjoy!
cooklang:
Combine @hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot){0.67%cup}, @butter{0.5%cup}, @white vinegar{1.5%Tbsp}, @Worcestershire sauce{1/4%tsp}, @cayenne pepper{0.25%tsp}, @garlic powder{0.125%tsp}, and @salt{} in a #pot{} over medium heat.

Bring to a simmer while stirring with a whisk. As soon as the liquid begins to bubble on the sides of the pot, remove from heat, stir with the whisk, and set aside for use.

garlic powder = 0.125 tsp
salt = some

RECIPE:
1. Combine hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot), butter, white vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, cayenne, garlic powder, and salt in a pot over medium heat.
2. Bring to a simmer while stirring with a whisk.
3. As soon as the liquid begins to bubble on the sides of the pot, remove from heat, stir with the whisk, and set aside for use.

name: Whipped Almond Ricotta
ingredients: 2 cups slivered blanched almonds,3 tsp nutritional yeast,2 Tbsp lemon juice,1 dash garlic powder,3 Tbsp basil, oregano, or parsley (optional),1 cup water,0.75 tsp salt
method: Add all ricotta ingredients (starting with the lesser amount of water (3/4 cup/180 ml and salt (1/2 tsp) as original recipe is written) to a high-speed blender and blend until smooth and creamy, scraping down sides as needed (
cooklang:
Add @slivered blanched almonds{2%cups}, @nutritional yeast{3%tsp}, @lemon juice{2%Tbsp}, @garlic powder{1%dash}, and @basil, oregano, or parsley (optional){3%Tbsp} (starting with the lesser amount of @water{1%cup} (3/4 cup/180 ml and @salt{3/4%tsp} (1/2 tsp) as original recipe is written) to a #high-speed blender{} and blend until smooth and creamy, scraping down sides as needed, about ~{2%minutes}. You are looking for a well-puréed mixture with only very small bits of almonds intact. Add a bit more water a little at a time if the mixture is having a hard time blending until smooth.

Taste and adjust flavor as needed, adding more salt for overall flavor, nutritional yeast for cheesiness, and lemon juice for acidity. For even more flavor, you can add in some fresh basil, oregano, or parsley (optional).

At this point, the “cheese” is ready to enjoy, especially in dishes like Lasagna, Pizza, or Stuffed Shells. However, it can also be wrapped in cheesecloth, formed into a ball, and placed into a fine mesh strainer set over a mixing bowl up to 3 days. This will allow the “cheese” to firm up a bit. However, this is optional. You can also transfer straight from blender to a storage container and refrigerate.

Store leftovers covered in the refrigerator up to 5-7 days.

- 3 tsp nutritional yeast
- 2 Tbsp lemon juice

- 3 Tbsp basil, oregano, or parsley (optional)
- 1 cup water
- 0.75 tsp salt

RECIPE:
Blend:
  - 1/4 cup water
  - 1/2 tsp salt
  - ricotta cheese
  - 2 cups slivered blanched almonds
  - 3 tsp nutritional yeast
  - 2 Tbsp lemon juice
  - 1 dash garlic powder
  - 3 Tbsp basil, oregano, or parsley (optional)

name: Pumpkin Curry Sauce
ingredients: 1 Tbsp olive oil,1  yellow onion,1 Tbsp garlic,1 tsp ginger,2 Tbsp red curry paste,1 cup pumpkin puree,1 15-oz can coconut milk,0.5 tsp pepper,1 tsp salt
method: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Once the oil is hot, add onion, garlic, and ginger to the pan. Cook the aromatics until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the red curry paste, pumpkin puree, coconut milk, pepper, and salt to the pan and stir well. Bring the curry sauce to a simmer and cook for 15 minutes. Serve and enjoy

Serve and enjoy.

name: Vegan Caesar Dressing
ingredients: 0.25 cup plain hummus,1 tsp spicy mustard,1  lemon zest,1  lemon juice,2 tsp minced capers + brining juice,5 cloves minced garlic,2 Tbsp Olive oil (optional),some  hot water,some  salt,some  pepper,2 tsp Maple syrup (optional)
method: To a small mixing bowl, add hummus, spicy mustard, lemon zest + juice, minced capers + brining juice, and minced garlic, and whisk thoroughly to combine. Olive oil is optional, but will add a bit more creaminess. Add a little hot water to thin until pourable and whisk until creamy and smooth (see photo). Taste and adjust flavor as needed, adding more salt and pepper, lemon juice, or minced garlic if desired! Maple syrup will help offset how salty and briney this dressing is, if you find you need it (I did not). Use immediately, or store in the refrigerator up to 5-7 days. This dressing is delicious on kale, romaine, and arugula. It would also be great on roasted vegetables, especially Brussels sprouts and potatoes. Top with a little vegan parmesan cheese for the ultimate Caesar salad experience
cooklang:
To a #small mixing bowl{}, add @plain hummus{1/4%cup}, @spicy mustard{1%tsp}, @lemon zest{1}, @lemon juice{1}, @minced capers + brining juice{2%tsp}, and @minced garlic{5%cloves}, and whisk thoroughly to combine. @Olive oil (optional){2%Tbsp} is optional, but will add a bit more creaminess.

Add a little @hot water{} to thin until pourable and whisk until creamy and smooth. Taste and adjust flavor as needed, adding more @salt{} and @pepper{}, lemon juice, or minced garlic if desired! @Maple syrup (optional){2%tsp} will help offset how salty and briney this dressing is, if you find you need it.

Use immediately, or store in the refrigerator up to 5-7 days.

This dressing is delicious on kale, romaine, and arugula. It would also be great on roasted vegetables, especially Brussels sprouts and potatoes. Top with a little vegan Parmesan cheese for the ultimate Caesar salad experience.
predict_cooklang:
INGREDIENTS:
- 0.25 cup plain hummus
- 1 tsp spicy mustard
- 1 lemon zest
- 1 lemon juice
- 2 tsp minced capers + brining juice
- 5 cloves minced garlic
- 2 Tbsp Olive oil (optional)
- some hot water
- some salt
- some pepper
- 2 tsp Maple syrup (optional)

RECIPE:
WHISK TOGETHER hummus, spicy mustard, lemon zest + juice, minced capers + brining juice, and minced garlic.
ADD Olive oil if desired for creaminess.
ADD a little hot water to thin until pourable and whisk until creamy and smooth.
TASTE AND ADJUST flavor as needed by adding more salt and pepper, lemon juice, or minced garlic.
IF NEEDED, ADD Maple syrup to offset the saltiness and brininess of the dressing.
USE IMMEDIATELY or store in refrigerator for up to 5-7 days.

name: Tomato Sauce
ingredients: 4 lbs plum tomato,2 28-oz cans whole peeled plum tomatoes (alternative),6 Tbsp unsalted butter,4 Tbsp olive oil,2 medium yellow onions,4 cloves garlic,1.25 tsp salt,1 tsp granulated sugar,2 Tbsp fresh basil
method: If using fresh tomatoes: Bring a large pot of water to a rolling boil. Fill a large bowl halfway-full with ice cubes and cold water. Using a sharp knife, cut a ¼-inch deep X on one end of each tomato. Place the scored tomatoes into the boiling water and cook until you see the skin starting to wrinkle and split, 1 to 2 minutes (be careful not to cook too long, or the tomatoes will become soft and difficult to handle). Using a slotted spoon, lift the tomatoes out of the pot and plunge them into the ice-cold water bath. Let sit for a few minutes to cool, then transfer the tomatoes to a cutting board and, using your hands, peel off their skins.  Cut the tomatoes into ½-inch chunks (discard the cores at this point) and transfer them, along with all of their juices, into a Dutch oven or saucepan.  To the chopped tomatoes, add the butter, olive oil, onions, garlic, salt, and sugar. Bring to a gentle boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 1½ to 2½ hours, stirring occasionally and mashing the tomatoes, until the sauce is no longer watery. Remove and discard the onions. Using a wooden spoon or potato masher, mash any large chunks of tomatoes and garlic to make a slightly chunky and thick sauce. Taste and adjust seasoning if necessary. Before serving, stir in the basil.  Make-Ahead Instructions: The sauce can be refrigerated for up to 4 days or frozen in an airtight container for up to 3 months
cooklang:
If using fresh tomatoes: Bring a large #pot{} of water to a rolling boil. Fill a #large bowl{} halfway-full with ice cubes and cold water. Using a #sharp knife{}, cut a 1/4 inch deep X on one end of each @plum tomato{4%lbs}. Place the scored tomatoes into the boiling water and cook until you see the skin starting to wrinkle and split, 1 to ~{2%minutes} (be careful not to cook too long, or the tomatoes will become soft and difficult to handle). Using a slotted spoon, lift the tomatoes out of the pot and plunge them into the ice cold water bath. Let sit for a few minutes to cool, then transfer the tomatoes to a cutting board and, using your hands, peel off their skins.

Cut the tomatoes into 1/2 inch chunks (discard the cores at this point) and transfer them, along with all of their juices, into a #Dutch oven or saucepan{}. Alternatively, you may use canned @whole peeled plum tomatoes (alternative){2%28-oz cans}.

To the chopped tomatoes, add the @unsalted butter{6%Tbsp}, @olive oil{4%Tbsp}, @yellow onions{2%medium}, @garlic{4%cloves}, @salt{1.25%tsp}, and @granulated sugar{1%tsp}. Bring to a gentle boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 1.5 to ~{2.5%hours}, stirring occasionally and mashing the tomatoes, until the sauce is no longer watery.

Remove and discard the onions.

Using a #wooden spoon or potato masher{}, mash any large chunks of tomatoes and garlic to make a slightly chunky and thick sauce.

Taste and adjust seasoning if necessary. Before serving, stir in the chopped @fresh basil{2%Tbsp}.
predict_cooklang:
INGR: plum tomato (4 lbs), whole peeled plum tomatoes (2 x 28 oz cans), unsalted butter (6 Tbsp), olive oil (4 Tbsp), yellow onion (2 medium), garlic (4 cloves), salt (1.25 tsp), granulated sugar (1 tsp), fresh basil (2 Tbsp)

STEP: BOIL WATER
  - ACTION: Bring a large pot of water to a rolling boil.

STEP: PREP TOMATOES
  - ACTION: Cut a ¼-inch deep X on one end of each tomato.
  - ACTION: Place the scored tomatoes into the boiling water and cook until you see the skin starting to wrinkle and split, 1 to 2 minutes.
  - ACTION: Lift the tomatoes out of the pot and plunge them into an ice-cold water bath.

STEP: PEEL TOMATOES
  - ACTION: Let sit for a few minutes to cool.
  - ACTION: Transfer the tomatoes to a cutting board and peel off their skins using your hands.

STEP: PREP SAUCE
  - ACTION: Cut the peeled tomatoes into ½-inch chunks (discard the cores at this point).
  - ACTION: Add the butter, olive oil, onions, garlic, salt, and sugar to the chopped tomatoes.
  - ACTION: Bring to a gentle boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 1½ to 2½ hours.

STEP: MASH SAUCE
  - ACTION: Stir occasionally and mash the tomatoes until the sauce is no longer watery.
  - ACTION: Remove and discard the onions.
  - ACTION: Mash any large chunks of tomatoes and garlic using a wooden spoon or potato masher.

STEP: FINALIZE SAUCE
  - ACTION: Taste and adjust seasoning if necessary.
  - ACTION: Stir in the fresh basil before serving.

STEP: MAKE-AHEAD INSTRUCTIONS
  - ACTION: Refrigerate the sauce for up to 4 days or freeze it in an airtight container for up to 3 months.

name: Cilantro Dressing
ingredients: 0.333 cup rice vinegar,4 Tbsp olive oil,0.25 cup mayonnaise,3 oz cotija cheese or queso fresco,1  lime juice,1 clove garlic,1  jalapeño,0.5 cup cilantro,0.5 Tbsp salt
method: Add all ingredients to a blender in order given. Process until smooth
cooklang:
Add @rice vinegar{1/3%cup}, @olive oil{4%Tbsp}, @mayonnaise{1/4%cup}, @cotija cheese or queso fresco{3%oz}, @lime juice{1}, @garlic{1%clove}, @jalapeño{1}, @cilantro{1/2%cup}, and @salt{1/2%Tbsp} to a #blender{} in the order given.

Process until smooth.
predict_cooklang:
Add 0.333 cup rice vinegar to blender.
Add 4 Tbsp olive oil to blender.
Add 0.25 cup mayonnaise to blender.
Add 3 oz cotija cheese or queso fresco to blender.
Add 1 lime juice to blender.
Add 1 clove garlic to blender.
Add 1 jalapeño to blender.
Add 0.5 cup cilantro to blender.
Add 0.5 Tbsp salt to blender.

Process until smooth.

name: Tahini
ingredients: 1 cup sesame seeds,3 Tbsp vegetable oil,1 pinch salt
method: Add sesame seeds to a wide, dry saucepan over medium-low heat and toast, stirring constantly, until the seeds become fragrant and turn light golden, 3 to 5 minutes. Stay close and keep stirring, as the seeds can burn quickly. Add the toasted sesame seeds to the bowl of a food processor, then process until a crumbly paste, about 1 minute. Add 2 tablespoons of the oil, then process for 2 to 3 minutes more, stopping to scrape the bottom and sides of the food processor a couple of times. Check the tahini’s consistency. It should be smooth, not gritty, and should be pourable. You may need to process for another minute and add 1 to 2 more tablespoons of oil. Taste the tahini for seasoning, then add salt to taste. Process 5 to 10 seconds to mix. Store tahini in an airtight container in the fridge for one month
cooklang:
Add @sesame seeds{1%cup} to a wide, dry #saucepan{} over medium-low heat and toast, stirring constantly until the seeds become fragrant and very lightly colored (not brown), 3 to ~{5%minutes}. Careful here, sesame seeds can burn quickly.

Transfer toasted seeds to a #baking sheet or large plate{} and cool completely.

Add sesame seeds to the bowl of a #food processor{} then process until a crumbly paste, about ~{1%minute}.

Add 3 tablespoons of the @vegetable oil{3%Tbsp} then process for 2 to ~{3%minutes} more, stopping to scrape the bottom and sides of the food processor a couple of times. Check the tahini’s consistency. It should be smooth, not gritty, and should be pourable. You may need to process for another minute or add the additional tablespoon of oil.

Taste the tahini for seasoning then add @salt{1%pinch} to taste. Process 5 to 10 seconds to mix it in.

Store tahini covered in the refrigerator for one month. You may notice it separates over time, like a natural peanut butter would. If this happens, give the tahini a good stir before using.
predict_cooklang:
TOAST SESAME SEEDS:
  - INGREDIENTS: sesame seeds
  - EQUIPMENT: saucepan
  - HEAT: medium-low
  - TIME: 3-5 minutes
  - ACTION: toast, stirring constantly

MAKE TAHINI PASTE:
  - INGREDIENTS: toasted sesame seeds, vegetable oil, salt
  - EQUIPMENT: food processor
  - ACTION: process until crumbly paste (1 minute)
  - ADDITIONAL STEPS:
    - PROCESS WITH 2 TABLESPOONS OIL (2-3 minutes), stopping to scrape the bottom and sides a couple of times.
    - CHECK CONSISTENCY, PROCESS IF NECESSARY, AND ADD MORE OIL IF NEEDED
    - TASTE FOR SEASONING, ADD SALT TO TASTE

STORE TAHINI:
  - INGREDIENTS: tahini paste
  - EQUIPMENT: airtight container
  - ACTION: store in fridge for one month

name: New York-Style Pizza Sauce
ingredients: 1 28-oz can tomatoes,1 Tbsp olive oil,1 Tbsp butter,2 cloves garlic,1 tsp oregano,1 pinch pepper flakes,1 large pinch salt,1 medium yellow onion,2 sprigs basil,1 tsp sugar
method: Process tomatoes and their juice through food mill, pulse in food processor until puréed, or purée with immersion blender. Purée should not be completely smooth, but should have no chunks larger than 1/16th of an inch. Set tomatoes aside. Combine oil and butter in medium saucepan and heat over medium-low heat until butter is melted. Add garlic, oregano, pepper flakes, and a large pinch of salt and cook, stirring frequently, until fragrant but not browned, about 3 minutes. Add tomatoes, onion halves, basil sprigs, and sugar. Bring to a simmer, reduce heat to lowest setting (bubbles should barely be breaking the surface), and cook, stirring occasionally, until reduced by half, about 1 hour. Discard onions and basil stems. Season to taste with salt. Allow to cool and store in covered container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks
cooklang:
Process @tomatoes{1%28-oz can} and their juice through #food mill{}, pulse in #food processor{} until puréed, or purée with immersion blender. Purée should not be completely smooth, but should have no chunks larger than 1/16th of an inch. Set tomatoes aside.

Combine @olive oil{1%Tbsp} and @butter{1%Tbsp} in #medium saucepan{} and heat over medium-low heat until butter is melted. Add @garlic{2%cloves}, @oregano{1%tsp}, @pepper flakes{1%pinch}, and large pinch @salt{1%large pinch} and cook, stirring frequently, until fragrant but not browned, about ~{3%minutes}.

Add tomatoes, @yellow onion{1%medium} halves, @basil{2%sprigs} sprigs, and @sugar{1%tsp}.

Bring to a simmer, reduce heat to lowest setting (bubbles should barely be breaking the surface), and cook, stirring occasionally, until reduced by half, about ~{1%hour}. Discard onions and basil stems. Season to taste with salt. Allow to cool and store in covered container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
predict_cooklang:
INGREDIENTS:
- tomatoes
- olive oil
- butter
- garlic
- oregano
- pepper flakes
- salt
- onion
- basil
- sugar

RECIPE:
PURÉE TOMATOES THROUGH FOOD MILL OR WITH IMMERSION BLENDER.
COMBINE OIL AND BUTTER IN MEDIUM SAUCEPAN. HEAT OVER MEDIUM-LOW HEAT UNTIL BUTTER IS MELTED.

ADD GARLIC, OREGANO, PEPPER FLAKES, AND LARGE PINCH OF SALT TO SAUCEPAN. COOK FOR 3 MINUTES, STIRRING FREQUENTLY.

ADD TOMATOES, ONION HALVES, BASIL SPRIGS, AND SUGAR TO SAUCEPAN. BRING TO SIMMER. REDUCE HEAT TO LOWEST SETTING AND COOK FOR 1 HOUR, STIRRING OCCASIONALLY.

DISCARD ONIONS AND BASIL STEMS.
SEASON WITH SALT TO TASTE.

STORE IN COVERED CONTAINER IN REFRIGERATOR FOR UP TO 2 WEEKS.

name: Simple Berry Compote
ingredients: 3 cups fruit,3 Tbsp orange juice,0.25 tsp cinnamon (optional),0.25 tsp ginger (optional),1 tsp granulated sugar (optional),1 tsp chia seeds (optional)
method: Place fruit and juice in a small saucepan and bring to medium heat. Once bubbling, reduce heat slightly and use a wooden spoon to muddle and mash the fruit. Continue cooking over medium-low heat for 10-12 minutes, occasionally mashing fruit to combine. Turn off heat and add optional add-ins at this point (cinnamon, ginger, sugar, chia seeds). Remove from heat and transfer to a clean jar or container to cool thoroughly. Store in the fridge up to 1 week or freeze in ice cube molds up to 1 month. Reheat to serve with oats, pancakes, waffles, french toast, and more!
cooklang:
Place @fruit{3%cups} and @orange juice{3%Tbsp} in a #small saucepan{} and bring to medium heat.

Once bubbling, reduce heat slightly and use a #wooden spoon{} to muddle and mash the fruit.

Continue cooking over medium-low heat for 10 to ~{12%minutes}, occasionally mashing fruit to combine. Turn off heat and add optional add-ins at this point (@cinnamon (optional){1/4%tsp}, @ginger (optional){1/4%tsp}, @granulated sugar (optional){1%tsp}, @chia seeds (optional){1%tsp}).

Remove from heat and transfer to a clean #jar or container{} to cool thoroughly. Store in the fridge up to 1 week or freeze in ice cube molds up to 1 month. Reheat to serve with oats, pancakes, waffles, french toast, and more!
predict_cooklang:
Pantry:
  - fruit: 3 cups
  - orange juice: 3 Tbsp
  - cinnamon (optional): 0.25 tsp
  - ginger (optional): 0.25 tsp
  - granulated sugar (optional): 1 tsp
  - chia seeds (optional): 1 tsp

Recipe:
  1. Place fruit and orange juice in a small saucepan.
  2. Bring to medium heat.
  3. Reduce heat slightly and muddle/mash the fruit with a wooden spoon.
  4. Continue cooking over medium-low heat for 10-12 minutes, occasionally mashing fruit to combine.
  5. Turn off heat.
  6. Add optional add-ins (cinnamon, ginger, sugar, chia seeds).
  7. Transfer mixture to a clean jar or container to cool thoroughly.
  8. Store in the fridge up to 1 week or freeze in ice cube molds up to 1 month.
  9. Reheat to serve with oats, pancakes, waffles, french toast, and more!

name: French Dressing
ingredients: 1 cup sugar,0.667 cup ketchup,0.5 cup olive oil,0.5 cup white vinegar,0.5 tsp celery seed,0.5 tsp chili powder,0.5 tsp dried mustard,0.5 tsp onion powder,0.125 tsp paprika,2 tsp salt
method: In a food processor or blender, add sugar, ketchup, olive oil, white vinegar, celery seed, chili powder, dried mustard, onion powder, paprika, and salt to taste (I like 2 teaspoons). Process until smooth and store covered in the refrigerator for up to 4 days
cooklang: In a #food processor or blender{}, add @sugar{1%cup}, @ketchup{2/3%cup}, @olive oil{1/2%cup}, @white vinegar{1/2%cup}, @celery seed{1/2%tsp}, @chili powder{1/2%tsp}, @dried mustard{1/2%tsp}, @onion powder{1/2%tsp}, @paprika{1/8%tsp}, and @salt{2%tsp} to taste (I like 2 teaspoons). Process until smooth and store covered in the refrigerator for up to 4 days.

  - CHILI POWDER: 0.5 tsp

  - SALT: 2 tsp

2. PROCESS until SMOOTH.
3. STORE COVERED in the REFRIGERATOR for up to 4 DAYS.

name: Tofu Mayonnaise
ingredients: 1-12.3-oz pkg  firm silken tofu,1 Tbsp apple cider vinegar,2 tsp Dijon mustard,0.75 tsp garlic powder,0.75 tsp onion powder,0.75 tsp salt,0.5 tsp coconut or date sugar
method: Combine all the ingredients in a blender and process until smooth. For best results, chill for at least an hour before using
cooklang:
Combine @firm silken tofu{1-12.3-oz pkg}, @apple cider vinegar{1%Tbsp}, @Dijon mustard{2%tsp}, @garlic powder{3/4%tsp}, @onion powder{3/4%tsp}, @salt{3/4%tsp}, and @coconut or date sugar{1/2%tsp} in a #blender{} and process until smooth.

For best results, chill for at least an hour before using.

- garlic powder: 0.75 tsp
- onion powder: 0.75 tsp
- salt: 0.75 tsp

RECIPE:
Add tofu, apple cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and coconut or date sugar to blender.
Process until smooth.
Chill for at least 1 hour.

name: Roasted Red Pepper Coulis
ingredients: 1 Tbsp olive oil,1 cup onion,1 Tbsp garlic,1 24-oz jar roasted red peppers,some  salt,some  pepper
method: In a saucepan, heat the olive oil, when hot adds the onion and cook until translucent.Add the garlic, and when fragrant add the peppers and their juice and cook for 10 to 15 minutes. With an immersion blender, process until very smooth. Strain through a fine sieve or a Chinois and adjust seasoning with Salt and Pepper
cooklang:
In a #saucepan{}, heat the @olive oil{1%Tbsp}, when hot add the @onion{1%cup} and cook until translucent. Add the @garlic{1%Tbsp}, and when fragrant add the @roasted red peppers{1%24-oz jar} and their juice and cook for 10 to ~{15%minutes}.

With an #immersion blender{}, process until very smooth.

Strain through a #fine sieve or a chinois{} and adjust seasoning with @salt{} and @pepper{}.

name: Vegan Sour Cream
ingredients: 0.5 cup raw cashews,0.25 cup water,1 cup silken tofu,3 Tbsp lemon juice,1 tsp agave nectar,1 tsp white miso paste,0.25 tsp salt
method: Combine all the ingredients in a Vitamix or other high-powered blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Allow the mixture to chill for 1 hour to become thick
cooklang:
Soak the @raw cashews{1/2%cup} in water for a 2 to ~{3%hours} to reduce blending time and to allow the cashews to blend into a smooth and creamy texture.

Combine cashews, @water{1/4%cup}, @silken tofu{1%cup}, @lemon juice{3%Tbsp}, @agave nectar{1%tsp}, @white miso paste{1%tsp}, and @salt{1/4%tsp}  in a #food processor or blender{} and blend until smooth and creamy.

Allow the mixture to chill for ~{1%hour} to become thick.

name: Italian Vinaigrette
ingredients: 2 tsp nutritional yeast,1.5 tsp dried basil,0.5 tsp dried oregano,0.5 tsp garlic powder,0.25 tsp celery seed,1 pinch crushed red pepper (optional),0.125 tsp pepper,0.25 cup red wine vinegar,0.25 cup water,2 Tbsp maple syrup,1 Tbsp lemon juice,1.5 tsp tahini,1 tsp Dijon mustard,1 tsp salt
method: Combine all the ingredients in a blender and purée until smooth. Taste and add extra pepper if desired. Serve immediately or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a week
cooklang:
Combine @nutritional yeast{2%tsp}, @dried basil{1.5%tsp}, @dried oregano{1/2%tsp}, @garlic powder{1/2%tsp}, @celery seed{1/4%tsp}, @crushed red pepper (optional){1%pinch}, @pepper{1/8%tsp}, @red wine vinegar{1/4%cup}, @water{1/4%cup}, @maple syrup{2%Tbsp}, @lemon juice{1%Tbsp}, @tahini{1.5%tsp}, @Dijon mustard{1%tsp}, and @salt{1%tsp} in a #blender{} and purée until smooth.

Taste and add extra pepper if desired.

Serve immediately or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a week.

name: Simple Tartar Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup mayonnaise,2  dill pickles,2 Tbsp lemon juice,1 Tbsp dill,0.5 tsp salt
method: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl. Stir until creamy, then cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Remove from refrigerator and serve the tartar sauce
cooklang:
Combine all @mayonnaise{1%cup}, diced @dill pickles{2}, @lemon juice{2%Tbsp}, dried @dill{1%Tbsp}, and @salt{1/2%tsp} in a #small bowl{}.

Stir until creamy, then cover and refrigerate for ~{30%minutes}.

Remove from refrigerator and serve the tartar sauce.
predict_cooklang:
INGREDIENTS:
- MAYONNAISE: 1 cup
- DILL PICKLES: 2
- LEMON JUICE: 2 Tbsp
- DILL: 1 Tbsp
- SALT: 0.5 tsp

RECIPE:
COMBINE all ingredients in a small bowl.
STIR until creamy.
COVER and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
REMOVE from refrigerator and SERVE the tartar sauce.

name: Mayonnaise
ingredients: 1 large egg,4 tsp white wine vinegar,0.5 tsp Dijon mustard,0.75 tsp salt,0.25 tsp sugar,1.5 cups vegetable oil
method: Do not substitute olive oil for the vegetable oil; the mayonnaise will turn out bitter.  This recipe contains raw or undercooked eggs, which comes with inherent risks. To learn more about food safety,    check out this guide   . Process egg, vinegar, mustard, salt, and sugar in food processor until combined, about 5 seconds. With processor running, slowly drizzle in oil until emulsified and mixture is thick, about 2 minutes. Scrape down sides of bowl with rubber spatula and continue to process 5 seconds longer. Transfer to airtight container and refrigerate until ready to use. (Mayonnaise can be refrigerated for up to 1 week.) If you add the oil too quickly the emulsion will break and look like lumpy greasy salad dressingnot appealing. Add the oil slowly especially at first and your mayo will come together perfectly
cooklang:
Do not substitute olive oil for the vegetable oil; the mayonnaise will turn out bitter.

Process @egg{1%large}, @white wine vinegar{4%tsp}, @Dijon mustard{1/2%tsp}, @salt{3/4%tsp}, and @sugar{1/4%tsp} in #food processor{} until combined, about 5 seconds. With processor running, slowly drizzle in @vegetable oil{1.5%cups} until emulsified and mixture is thick, about 2 minutes. Scrape down sides of bowl with #rubber spatula{} and continue to process 5 seconds longer. Transfer to #airtight container{} and refrigerate until ready to use. (Mayonnaise can be refrigerated for up to 1 week.)
predict_cooklang:
INGREDIENTS:
  - egg: 1
  - white wine vinegar: 4 tsp
  - Dijon mustard: 0.5 tsp
  - salt: 0.75 tsp
  - sugar: 0.25 tsp
  - vegetable oil: 1.5 cups

PROCESS:
  1. Combine egg, vinegar, mustard, salt, and sugar in food processor.
  2. Process until combined for about 5 seconds.
  3. With processor running, slowly drizzle in oil until emulsified and mixture is thick for about 2 minutes.
  4. Scrape down sides of bowl with rubber spatula.
  5. Continue to process for an additional 5 seconds.
  6. Transfer to airtight container.
  7. Refrigerate until ready to use.

WARNING:
  - Raw or undercooked eggs pose inherent risks; consult the provided guide for more information on food safety.
  - Do not substitute olive oil for vegetable oil, as it may result in bitter mayonnaise.
  - Add oil slowly, especially at first, to prevent emulsion breakdown and achieve a smooth consistency.

name: Single Jar of Fruit Jam
ingredients: 2 cup fruit,0.75 cup sugar,1 Tbsp lemon juice
method: Wash and cut the fruit. Wash and hull the fruit as needed. Cut large strawberries into quarters and peaches into bite-sized pieces. Combine the fruit with sugar and mash. Combine the fruit with the sugar and lemon juice in a medium, heavy-bottomed saucepan. Gently mash with a wooden spoon until the fruit is juicy and most of the sugar is dissolved. Cook until jammy. Cook over a medium heat, continuing to mashing down on the fruit with a wooden spoon. Bring to a rolling boil and continue to cook, stirring frequently, until the jam is thick and darkened in color, about 20 minutes. Transfer the jam to a jar and refrigerate. Carefully spoon into a very clean (8-ounce) jar and let cool to room temperature. Seal the jar and refrigerate
cooklang:
This jam calls for just two cups of chopped fruit. This is about one pint of berries, four to six peaches or plums, or eight small apricots.

Wash and cut the @fruit{2%cup}. Wash and hull the fruit as needed. Cut large strawberries into quarters and peaches into bite-sized pieces.

Combine the fruit with @sugar{0.75%cup} and mash. Combine the fruit with the sugar and @lemon juice{1%Tbsp} in a #medium, heavy-bottomed saucepan{}. Gently mash with a #wooden spoon{} until the fruit is juicy and most of the sugar is dissolved.

Cook until jammy. Cook over a medium heat, continuing to mashing down on the fruit with a wooden spoon. Bring to a rolling boil and continue to cook, stirring frequently, until the jam is thick and darkened in color, about ~{20%minutes}.

Transfer the jam to an #8-oz jar{} and refrigerate. Carefully spoon into a very clean (8-ounce) jar and let cool to room temperature. Seal the jar and refrigerate.
predict_cooklang:
prep:
  - wash: fruit
  - cut: fruit (into quarters for strawberries and bite-sized pieces for peaches)
  - hull: fruit (as needed)

cook:
  - combine: fruit, sugar
  - mash: fruit with sugar
  - combine: fruit, sugar, lemon juice
  - cook: over medium heat
  - mash: down on the fruit with a wooden spoon
  - bring to boil: rolling boil
  - cook: until jammy (about 20 minutes)
  - stir: frequently

serve:
  - transfer: jam to a jar
  - refrigerate: jam in the jar
  - cool: to room temperature
  - seal: jar and refrigerate

name: Mixed Berry Coulis
ingredients: 2 cups frozen mixed berries,0.25 cups granulated sugar (optional),0.25 cup lemon juice (optional),2 Tbsp Chambord Liqueur or Grand Marnier (optional)
method: Place berries, sugar and lemon juice in a blender and purée until very smooth. Strain through a fine sieve (Chinois is best) into a glass bowl, pressing on solids to extract all the juice. Stir inChambord Liqueur or Grand Marnier, taste and adjust the sugar to your liking. NOTE:If it is too sour, add sugar. If it is too sweet add lemon juice.It all depends on the fruits you are using!
cooklang:
Defrost @frozen mixed berries{2%cups} in a strainer for ~{24%hours} so that the excess water drains into a bowl.

Place berries, @granulated sugar (optional){1/4%cups} and @lemon juice (optional){1/4%cup} in a #blender{} and purée until very smooth.

Mix in @Chambord Liqueur or Grand Marnier (optional){2%Tbsp}, taste and adjust the sugar to your liking.

Strain through a #fine sieve or chinois{} into a #glass bowl{}, pressing on solids to extract all the juice.

NOTE: If it is too sour, add sugar. If it is too sweet add lemon juice. It all depends on the fruits you are using!
predict_cooklang:
do combine 2 cups frozen mixed berries, 0.25 cups granulated sugar (optional), 0.25 cup lemon juice (optional)
do blend until very smooth
do strain through a fine sieve into a glass bowl, pressing on solids to extract all the juice
add 2 Tbsp Chambord Liqueur or Grand Marnier (optional) to the mixture
taste and adjust the sugar to your liking
if too sour, add sugar; if too sweet, add lemon juice

name: Dijon Mustard
ingredients: 2 Tbsp brown mustard seeds,4 Tbsp yellow mustard seeds,0.75 tsp salt,0.25 tsp white pepper,1 pinch all spice,1 Tbsp shallot or white or yellow onion,0.333 cup white wine vinegar,0.25 cup dry white wine
method: Add all dry ingredients together and mix: mustard seeds, salt, white pepper, all spice.  Add shallot / onion and mix.  Add white wine vinegar and mix.  Add white wine and mix.  Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 8 hours. Add mix to blender or food processor.  Blend until thickness and chunkiness desired.  Taste and add brown sugar if too bitter for your taste. Store in a small mason jar in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks to 2 months. See notes
cooklang:
Add all dry ingredients together and mix: @brown mustard seeds{2%Tbsp}, @yellow mustard seeds{4%Tbsp}, @salt{3/4%tsp}, @white pepper{1/4%tsp}, @all spice{1%pinch}. Add @shallot or white or yellow onion{1%Tbsp} and mix. Add @white wine vinegar{1/3%cup} and mix. Add @dry white wine{1/4%cup} and mix. Cover with #plastic wrap{} and refrigerate for at least 8 hours.

Add mix to #blender or food processor{}. Blend until thickness and chunkiness desired.

Store in a small mason jar in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks to 2 months. See notes.

You can omit the wine for water to remove any alcohol content for children or pregnancy.

This recipe makes spicy Dijon mustard. To adjust the heat, reduce the amount of brown mustard seeds.
predict_cooklang:
Recipe: Mustard Sauce

Ingredients:
- 2 Tbsp brown mustard seeds
- 4 Tbsp yellow mustard seeds
- 0.75 tsp salt
- 0.25 tsp white pepper
- 1 pinch all spice
- 1 Tbsp shallot or white or yellow onion
- 0.333 cup white wine vinegar
- 0.25 cup dry white wine

Steps:
  - Add mustard seeds, salt, white pepper, and all spice together.
  - Mix until well combined.
  - Add shallot / onion and mix.
  - Add white wine vinegar and mix.
  - Add dry white wine and mix.
  - Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 8 hours.
  - Add mixture to blender or food processor.
  - Blend until desired thickness and chunkiness are achieved.
  - Taste and add brown sugar if too bitter, as needed.

Storage:
- Store in a small mason jar in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks to 2 months.

name: Hollandaise
ingredients: 0.5 cup butter,3 large egg yolks,1 Tbsp lemon juice,0.125 tsp salt,1 dash cayenne pepper,some  parsley
method: Gather the ingredients. Melt the butter in a saucepan until it is hot and foaming, but do not let it brown. Keep it warm. Place a medium saucepan or bottom of a double boiler pan with about an inch of hot water over low heat and bring it to a simmer . In a stainless steel bowl or top pan of a double boiler, vigorously whisk the egg yolks with the lemon juice until the mixture is thickened. Place the bowl or pan over the simmering water and continue whisking. Drizzle the melted butter into the egg yolk mixture in a slow, steady stream while whisking. Continue whisking until the sauce has thickened. Take care not to let the bowl or top pan sit in the simmering water or you'll end up with scrambled eggs. And don't let the sauce get too hot or it could break. If it does start to look curdled, try whisking in a small amount of boilingwater a half-teaspoon at a time. Remove the sauce from the heat and whisk inthe salt and cayenne pepper or hot pepper sauce. The sauce is best served immediately, but if it must be held, place the bowl in a pan with hot water or put it in the top of a double boiler over hot water. Keep it on very low heat. Too long or too hot and the sauce will break. If the sauce becomes too thick on standing, whisk in a small amount of hot water to thin it. Enjoy
cooklang:
Gather the ingredients.

Melt the @butter{0.5%cup} in a saucepan until it is hot and foaming, but do not let it brown. Keep it warm.

Place a #medium saucepan{} or bottom of a double boiler pan with about an inch of hot water over low heat and bring it to a simmer.

In a stainless steel bowl or top pan of a double boiler, vigorously whisk the @egg yolks{3%large} with the @lemon juice{1%Tbsp} until the mixture is thickened.

Place the bowl or pan over the simmering water and continue whisking.

Drizzle the melted butter into the egg yolk mixture in a slow, steady stream while whisking. Continue whisking until the sauce has thickened. Take care not to let the bowl or top pan sit in the simmering water or you'll end up with scrambled eggs. And don't let the sauce get too hot or it could break. If it does start to look curdled, try whisking in a small amount of boiling water a half-teaspoon at a time.

Remove the sauce from the heat and whisk in the @salt{0.125%tsp} and @cayenne pepper{1%dash} or hot pepper sauce.

The sauce is best served immediately, but if it must be held, place the bowl in a pan with hot water or put it in the top of a double boiler over hot water. Keep it on very low heat. Too long or too hot and the sauce will break.

If the sauce becomes too thick on standing, whisk in a small amount of hot water to thin it.

Top with finely chopped @parsley{} and enjoy.

IF the sauce becomes too thick on standing, WHISK IN a small amount of hot water to thin it.

name: German soup with cheese and leeks
ingredients: 2 bunch leeks,1 head onion,1  lemon,some  oil,500 g minced meat,200 ml cream,200 g processed cheese,700 ml vegetable broth,some  salt,some  pepper
method: Lauch längs halbieren, Wurzelansatz entfernen, in grobe Stücke schneiden und waschen. Zwiebel halbieren und schälen. Zitrone heiß abwaschen, etwa 1 TL Schale fein abreiben, halbieren und Saft auspressen. In den Mixtopf Zwiebel und Lauch geben. Gemüse 10Sek./Stufe8 zerkleinern. Anschließend umfüllen. In den Mixtopf Öl und Hackfleisch geben und 5Min./Anbratstufe anbraten. Lauch, Sahne, Schmelzkäse, Zitronenabrieb und Gemüsebrühe zugeben und ohne Messbecher 15Min./Stufe1/100°C garen. Käse-Lauch-Suppe mit Salz, Pfeffer und Zitronensaft abschmecken und auf Tellern verteilt servieren..Guten Appetit!

name: Hollandaise
ingredients: 125 g butter,2 large eggs,0.5 tsp white wine,0.5 tsp tarragon vinegar,some  salt,splash  water,0.5  lemon,some  cayenne pepper
method: Melt the butter in a saucepan and skim any white solids from the surface. Keep the butter warm. Put the egg yolks, white wine or tarragon vinegar, a pinch of salt and a splash of ice-cold water in a metal or glass bowl that will fit over a small pan. Whisk for a few minutes. Then put the bowl over a pan of barely simmering water and whisk continuously until pale and thick, about 3-5 mins. Remove from the heat and slowly whisk in the melted butter bit by bit until it’s all incorporated and you have a creamy hollandaise. (If it gets too thick, add a splash of water.) Season with a squeeze of lemon juice and a little cayenne pepper. Keep warm until needed. To make eggs benedict, toast the muffin halves, top each half with a slice of warmed ham and a poached egg, and spoon over a generous helping of hollandaise
cooklang:
Melt the @butter{125%g} in a #saucepan{} and skim any white solids from the surface. Keep the butter warm.

Put the yolk of the @eggs{2%large}, @white wine{1/2%tsp} or @tarragon vinegar{1/2%tsp}, a @salt and a splash of ice-cold @water{splash} in a metal or glass #bowl{} that will fit over a #small pan{}. Whisk for a ~{3-5%minutes}, then put the bowl over a pan of barely simmering water and whisk continuously until pale and thick, about ~{3-5%minutes}.

Remove from the heat and slowly whisk in the melted butter bit by bit until it`s all incorporated and you have a creamy hollandaise. (If it gets too thick, add a splash of water.) Season with a squeeze of @lemon{1/2} juice and a little @cayenne pepper{}. Keep warm until needed.

  - white wine: 0.5 tsp
  - tarragon vinegar: 0.5 tsp
  - salt: some
  - water: splash
  - lemon: 0.5
  - cayenne pepper: some

STEP 1:
  MELT butter in a saucepan and SKIM white solids from the surface.
  KEEP butter WARM.

STEP 2:
  WHISK egg yolks, white wine or tarragon vinegar, salt, and water in a metal or glass bowl that fits over a small pan for a few minutes.
  PLACE the bowl over a pan of barely simmering water and WHISK continuously until pale and thick (about 3-5 mins).
  REMOVE from heat and SLOWLY whisk in melted butter bit by bit until incorporated.

STEP 3:
  IF hollandaise gets too thick, ADD splash of water.
  SEASON with lemon juice and cayenne pepper.
  KEEP warm until needed.

STEP 4:
  TOAST muffin halves.
  TOP each half with a slice of warmed ham and a poached egg.
  SPOON over a generous helping of hollandaise to make eggs benedict.

name: lemon_pound_cake
ingredients: 1.5 cups flour,1 tsp baking powder,0.25 tsp salt,1 cup butter,1 cup white sugar,4  eggs,1 tsp vanilla,1.5 tbsp lemon zest,0.25 cups buttermilk,0.25 cups lemon juice,1.25 cups powerdered sugar,1 tsp lemon zest,6-8 tsp lemon juice
method: Preheat the oven to 350F / 180C / 160C fan forced. Grease and line a 6 cup capacity loaf tin with baking paper so that its sticking up above the sides. In a small bowl combine the flour, baking powder and salt, then whisk to combine well. In a large bowl or the bowl of stand mixer with paddle attachment, beat the butter and sugar until lightened and creamy. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, making sure each is fully incorporated before adding the next. Scrape the sides of the bowl from time to time. Add the vanilla and lemon zest and beat to combine. Add half the flour mixture and mix on low just until combined (no more). Follow with the combined buttermilk and lemon juice, mix in, then the rest of the flour mixing until only just combined. Tip the mixture into the prepared tin, then level out with a spatula. Bake for 50-60 minutes until a toothpick comes out with a crumb or two attached. Remove from tin after 5 minutes using the baking paper to lift it, then allow to cool completely before glazing. Mix together the icing sugar, zest and half the lemon juice. Slowly add more lemon juice until it gets to the desired consistency, then pour it over the cake
cooklang:
Preheat the #oven to 350 F. Grease and line a #6 cup capacity loaf tin{} with #baking paper{} so that its sticking up above the sides.

In a small bowl combine the @flour{3/2%cups}, @baking powder{1%tsp}, and @salt{1/4%tsp}, then #whisk to combine well.

In a #large bowl{} or the bowl of stand mixer with paddle attachment, beat the @butter{1%cup} and @white sugar{1%cup} until lightened and creamy.

Beat in the @eggs{4}, one at a time, making sure each is fully incorporated before adding the next. Scrape the sides of the bowl from time to time.

Add the @vanilla{1%tsp} and @lemon zest{3/2%tbsp} and beat to combine.

Add half the flour mixture and mix on low just until combined (no more).

Follow with the combined @buttermilk{1/4%cups} and @lemon juice{1/4%cups}, mix in, then the rest of the flour mixing until only just combined.

Tip the mixture into the prepared tin, then level out.

Bake for ~{50-60%minutes} until a toothpick comes out with a crumb or two attached.

Remove from tin after ~{5%minutes} using the baking paper to lift it, then allow to cool completely before glazing.

Mix together the @powerdered sugar{5/4%cups}, @lemon zest{1%tsp}, and half the @lemon juice{6-8%tsp}. Slowly add more lemon juice until it gets to the desired consistency, then pour it over the cake.

name: strawberry_bundt_cake
ingredients: 3 cups flour,1.5 tsp baking powder,0.5 tsp baking soda,1.25 tsp salt,0.75 cups butter,1.75 cups sugar,1 lemon of lemon zest,3  eggs,1.25 cups yogurt,0.25 cups lemon juice,1 tsp vanilla,2.75 cups strawberries,0.25 cups strawberries,2 cups powdered sugar,2-3 tsp lemon juice
method: Make the cake: Position a rack in the center of the oven and heat oven to 325 degrees. Carefully butter and flour a 16-cup Bundt pan, making sure to get in all of the cracks and crevices. In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, mix the butter and sugar until combined. Add lemon zest, and then cream the mixture until light and fluffy on medium-high speed, about 5 minutes. With the mixer on low, add the eggs one at a time, making sure each egg is completely incorporated before adding the next. Add the yogurt, lemon juice and vanilla, and stir on medium speed to combine, scraping the sides of the bowl as necessary to incorporate all the ingredients. The mixture may curdle a bit, but don’t worry too much about it. Add the flour mixture all at once and mix on low until almost completely combined. Remove the bowl from the mixer, scrape and fold any excess flour into the batter, and scoop out roughly 1/2 cup/100 grams of batter. Drop tablespoons of batter into the bottom of the prepared pan, and smooth into the bottom of the pan. (This batter will prevent the strawberries from sinking to the bottom of the pan and sticking.) Add the chopped strawberries to the remaining batter in the bowl and gently fold in until the strawberries are evenly distributed. The batter will be thick. Spoon the batter evenly into the pan, smooth the top and tap the pan firmly on the counter a few times to release any large air bubbles. Bake the cake until golden brown and a skewer inserted into the center comes out clean (a few small crumbs are O.K.), about 70 minutes. Cool the pan on a rack for 15 minutes, then turn the cake out onto the rack to cool completely. When the cake is cool, make the glaze: In a medium bowl, use a fork to mash the reserved 1/4 cup/40 grams of strawberries. Whisk in the confectioners' sugar and 2 teaspoons of lemon juice. The glaze should be thick but just pourable. If it seems thin, add a bit more confectioners' sugar; if it is too thick to stir, add a bit more lemon juice. Pour the glaze evenly over the cake (you can glaze it over a rack if you prefer to let the excess glaze drip off), let it set for a few minutes and serve. Once the glaze has dried completely, refrigerate any leftover cake, loosely draped with plastic wrap
cooklang:
Heat #oven to 325 F. Butter and flour a #16-cup Bundt pan{}.

In a #medium bowl{}, #whisk{} together @flour{3%cups}, @baking powder{1.5%tsp}, @baking soda{0.5%tsp}, and @salt{1.25%tsp}. Set aside.

In the bowl of a #stand mixer{} fitted with the paddle attachment, mix the @butter{0.75%cups} and @sugar{1.75%cups} until combined. Add @lemon zest{1%lemon of}, and then cream the mixture until light and fluffy on medium-high speed, about ~{5%minutes}.

With the mixer on low, add the @eggs{3} one at a time, making sure each egg is completely incorporated before adding the next. Add the @yogurt{1.25%cups}, @lemon juice{0.25%cups}, and @vanilla{1%tsp}, and stir on medium speed to combine, scraping the sides of the bowl as necessary to incorporate all the ingredients. The mixture may curdle a bit, but don’t worry too much about it.

Add the flour mixture all at once and mix on low until almost completely combined.

Remove the bowl from the mixer, scrape and fold any excess flour into the batter, and scoop out roughly 0.5 cups. Drop tablespoons of batter into the bottom of the prepared pan, and smooth into the bottom of the pan. (This batter will prevent the strawberries from sinking to the bottom of the pan and sticking.) Add the @strawberries{2.75%cups}(chopped) to the remaining batter in the bowl and gently fold in until the strawberries are evenly distributed. The batter will be thick.

Spoon the batter evenly into the pan, smooth the top and tap the pan firmly on the counter a few times to release any large air bubbles. Bake the cake until golden brown and a skewer inserted into the center comes out clean (a few small crumbs are O.K.), about ~{70%minutes}. Cool the pan on a rack for ~{15%minutes}, then turn the cake out onto the rack to cool completely.

When the cake is cool, make the glaze: In a medium bowl, use a fork to mash the reserved @strawberries{0.25%cups}(chopped). Whisk in the @powdered sugar{2%cups} and @lemon juice{2-3%tsp}. The glaze should be thick but just pourable. If it seems thin, add a bit more powdered sugar; if it is too thick to stir, add a bit more lemon juice. Pour the glaze evenly over the cake (you can glaze it over a rack if you prefer to let the excess glaze drip off), let it set for a few minutes and serve. Once the glaze has dried completely, refrigerate any leftover cake, loosely draped with plastic wrap.

STEP PREHEAT oven to 325 degrees.
STEP BUTTER and flour a 16-cup Bundt pan.

MIX 3 cup flour, 1.5 tsp baking powder, 0.5 tsp baking soda, 1.25 tsp salt in a medium bowl.
SET aside.

MIX 0.75 cup butter, 1.75 cup sugar in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment.
ADD 1 lemon zest and cream until light and fluffy on medium-high speed for 5 minutes.

ADD 3 egg one at a time to the mixer and mix until combined.

ADD 1.25 cup yogurt, 0.25 cup lemon juice, 1 tsp vanilla to the mixer and stir on medium speed to combine.

ADD MIXED ingredients from step 2 to the mixer and mix on low until almost completely combined.

REMOVE excess flour from the batter and scoop out roughly 1/2 cup/100 grams of batter.
DROP tablespoons of batter into the bottom of the prepared pan and smooth into the bottom of the pan.

ADD 2.75 cup strawberries to the remaining batter in the bowl and gently fold in until evenly distributed.

SPOON the batter evenly into the pan, smooth the top, and tap the pan firmly on the counter a few times to release any large air bubbles.

BAKE the cake for 70 minutes or until golden brown and a skewer inserted into the center comes out clean.

COOL the pan on a rack for 15 minutes.
TURN the cake out onto the rack to cool completely.

MASH 0.25 cup strawberries in a medium bowl.
WHISK in 2 cup powdered sugar and 2 tsp lemon juice until thick but just pourable.

POUR the glaze evenly over the cake and let it set for a few minutes before serving.

REFRIGERATE any leftover cake loosely draped with plastic wrap.

name: braised_white_beans
ingredients: 1 tbsp butter,1 head garlic, halved crosswise,1 cup whole milk,1 15 ounce can chickpeas,1 15 ounce can white beans,1 sprig thyme,0.125 tsp ground nutmeg,some  salt,some  pepper.,4 slices bread,a drizzle of  oil,a sprinkle of  parmesan,a pinch of  Aleppo pepper and black pepper
method: In a medium saucepan, melt the butter over medium-high heat. Add the garlic, cut side down, and cook until golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes. Add the milk, chickpeas and their liquid, white beans, thyme and nutmeg and stir to combine. Season generously with salt and pepper. When the mixture begins to bubble around the edges of the pan (you don’t want it to come to a full boil), reduce the heat to low and let it simmer, stirring occasionally, until it has thickened and tastes great to you, about 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Use a fork to remove the garlic halves from the beans. Set aside until cool enough to handle, then use the fork to remove the cloves from the skins. Spread the cloves on bread or toast. If you would like the beans to be more stew-like, mash some of the beans using a potato masher or the back of a spoon. Serve beans and milk in bowls. Garnish as you wish, with a drizzle of oil, a sprinkle of Parmesan and a pinch of Aleppo pepper and black pepper. Serve with the bread alongside for dipping
cooklang:
In a #medium saucepan{}, melt the @butter{1%tbsp} over medium-high heat. Add the @garlic, halved crosswise{1%head}, cut side down, and cook until golden brown, ~{1-2%minutes}.

Add the @whole milk{1%cup}, @chickpeas{1%15 ounce can} and their liquid, @white beans{1%15 ounce can}, @thyme{1%sprig}, and @ground nutmeg{1/8%tsp} and stir to combine. Season generously with @salt and @pepper.

When the mixture begins to bubble around the edges of the pan (you don’t want it to come to a full boil), reduce the heat to low and let it simmer, stirring occasionally, until it has thickened and tastes great to you, about ~{15%minutes}. Season with salt and pepper, to taste.

Use a fork to remove the garlic halves from the beans. Set aside until cool enough to handle, then use the fork to remove the cloves from the skins. Spread the cloves on @bread{4%slices} or toast.

If you would like the beans to be more stew-like, mash some of the beans using a potato masher or the back of a spoon. Serve beans and milk in bowls. Garnish as you wish, with @oil{a drizzle of}, @parmesan{a sprinkle of}, and @Aleppo pepper and black pepper{a pinch of}. Serve with the bread alongside for dipping.
predict_cooklang:
INGREDIENTS:
  - butter: 1 tbsp
  - garlic: 1 head (halved crosswise)
  - milk: 1 cup (whole)
  - chickpeas: 1 can (15 ounce, liquid included)
  - white beans: 1 can (15 ounce)
  - thyme: 1 sprig
  - nutmeg: 0.125 tsp (ground)
  - salt: some (amount not specified)
  - pepper: some (amount not specified)
  - bread: 4 slices
  - oil: a drizzle
  - parmesan: a sprinkle
  - Aleppo pepper and black pepper: a pinch

COOK:
  MELT butter IN saucepan OVER medium-high HEAT.
  ADD garlic CUT SIDE DOWN TO saucepan AND COOK UNTIL golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes.
  ADD milk, chickpeas WITH liquid, white beans, thyme, and nutmeg TO saucepan. STIR TO COMBINE.
  SEASON WITH salt AND pepper GENEROUSLY.
  REDUCE HEAT TO low WHEN mixture begins to bubble AROUND edges OF pan.
  SIMMER saucepan UNTIL mixture thickens AND tastes great, about 15 minutes.
  SEASON WITH salt AND pepper TO taste.
  REMOVE garlic halves FROM beans USING fork. SET aside until cool enough TO handle.
  REMOVE cloves FROM skins USING fork. SPREAD cloves ON bread OR toast.
  IF desired, MASH some beans USING potato masher OR back OF spoon TO make stew-like consistency.
  SERVE beans AND milk IN bowls. GARNISH AS desired WITH drizzle OF oil, sprinkle OF parmesan, and pinch OF Aleppo pepper AND black pepper.
  SERVE with bread ALONGSIDE for dipping.

name: stuffing
ingredients: 3 cups crumbled cornbread,2 tbsp butter,1 small onion
method: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 7x11-inch baking dish. Place crumbled cornbread in a large bowl. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and celery and sauté until soft, 5 to 7 minutes. Add sautéed onion and celery to the crumbled cornbread. Stir in chicken stock, eggs, sage, salt, and pepper until well combined. Pour dressing into the prepared baking dish. Bake in the preheated oven until dressing just starts to turn golden brown around the edges, about 30 minutes. Serve and enjoy!
cooklang:
Preheat the #oven to 350 F. Grease a #7x11 baking dish{}. Place @crumbled cornbread{3%cups} in a #large bowl{}.

Melt @butter{2%tbsp} in a #large skillet{} over medium heat. Add @onion{1%small}(chopped) and @celery{1/2@cups}(chopped) and sauté until soft, ~{5-7%minutes}.

Add sautéed onion and celery to the crumbled cornbread. Stir in @chicken stock{2%cups}, @beaten eggs{2}, @sage{1%tbsp}, @salt{}, and @pepper{} until well combined. Pour dressing into the prepared baking dish.

Bake in the preheated oven until dressing just starts to turn golden brown around the edges, about ~{30%minutes}.
